abstract.original_text: • Severe community-acquired pneumonia (CAP) is associated with a high mortality rate and significant morbidity.

sentences.segment_text: • Severe community-acquired pneumonia ( CAP ) is associated with a high mortality rate and significant morbidity .

abstract.original_text: • Of patients presenting to hospital with CAP, up to 10% will require critical care admission.

up to 10 % will require critical care admission .

abstract.original_text: • Streptococcus pneumoniae continues as the most common infective pathogen.
